metadata.title: CVE-2012-5883 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Flash componentinfrastructure in YUI 2.8.0 through 2.9.0, as used in Bugzilla 3.7.x and4.0.x before 4.0.9, 4.1.x and 4.2.x before 4.2.4, and 4.3.x and 4.4.xbefore 4.4rc1, allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script orHTML via vectors related to swfstore.swf, a similar issue to CVE-2010-4209.

criterions.comment: yui: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
